Package abaloneprotocol

Interface Protocol

  • public interface Protocol
    Protocol for abalone.
    Author:
    Daan & Pepijn

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String ACCEPTMOVE
      this is used for the client to confirm to the server that the move is legal appended to this should be a 1/0 (1 for legal, 0 for illegal).
      static java.lang.String CHAT
      This is used by the client to send a chat message appended should be the message to be sent.
      static java.lang.String CLIENTCONFIRMSTART
      this is used for the client to confirm the game starting.
      static java.lang.String CONFIRMMOVE
      this is used for the server to confirm the move being made to all the clients who can then execute the move.
      static java.lang.String CONNECTMESSAGE
      The connectMessage is used by appending the Name to be used by the client.
      static java.lang.String DISCONNECT
      used by the server to indicate a person disconnecting.
      static java.lang.String DISTRIBUTECOLOR
      this is used to start the game and give colors to all the clients The server should append the color given to the player.
      static java.lang.String DRAWMESSAGE
      this is for messaging the clients that the game has ended in a draw.
      static java.lang.String MAKEMOVE
      this is used to make a move.
      static java.lang.String SERVERRESPONSE
      for the serverResponse to the connection request from the client The server name should be appended to this.
      static java.lang.String SERVERSTARTGAME
      This is the message for the server to send to all the clients to start the game.
      static int SOCKET  
      static java.lang.String SPLIT
      All the arguments should be split by a -.
      static java.lang.String WINNER
      used by the server to indicate that the game has been won the server should append the name of the client who won.

    • Field Detail

      • SPLIT

        static final java.lang.String SPLIT
        All the arguments should be split by a -.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SOCKET

        static final int SOCKET
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONNECTMESSAGE

        static final java.lang.String CONNECTMESSAGE
        The connectMessage is used by appending the Name to be used by the client. after that, the number of players that the client wants to be in for a game should be appended finally the the extensions the client would like to use should be appended

        For example: H-DaanAssies-3-1101

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DRAWMESSAGE

        static final java.lang.String DRAWMESSAGE
        this is for messaging the clients that the game has ended in a draw. to this should be appended a message why & who caused the game to end in a draw
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVERRESPONSE

        static final java.lang.String SERVERRESPONSE
        for the serverResponse to the connection request from the client The server name should be appended to this.

        For example: HR-DaansServer

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVERSTARTGAME

        static final java.lang.String SERVERSTARTGAME
        This is the message for the server to send to all the clients to start the game.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CLIENTCONFIRMSTART

        static final java.lang.String CLIENTCONFIRMSTART
        this is used for the client to confirm the game starting. The name that was used to connect should be used to confirm the client participating in the game

        for example: C-DaanAssies

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DISTRIBUTECOLOR

        static final java.lang.String DISTRIBUTECOLOR
        this is used to start the game and give colors to all the clients The server should append the color given to the player.

        For example: S-CYAN

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAKEMOVE

        static final java.lang.String MAKEMOVE
        this is used to make a move. to this should be appended: an array of 3 marbles (using the naive board) (1-61 and 0 for no marble selected in case of 1/2 marbles moved) the direction of which the marble should go (0-5, see the protocol document)

        (Optional if the move is a winning move) append W

        This message is sent from the client to the server, and then resent by the server to the other client(s)

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACCEPTMOVE

        static final java.lang.String ACCEPTMOVE
        this is used for the client to confirm to the server that the move is legal appended to this should be a 1/0 (1 for legal, 0 for illegal).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONFIRMMOVE

        static final java.lang.String CONFIRMMOVE
        this is used for the server to confirm the move being made to all the clients who can then execute the move.

        appended to this should be: an array of 3 marbles (using the naive board) (1-61 and 0 for no marble selected in case of 1/2 marbles moved) the direction of which the marble should go (0-5, see the protocol document)

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WINNER

        static final java.lang.String WINNER
        used by the server to indicate that the game has been won the server should append the name of the client who won.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DISCONNECT

        static final java.lang.String DISCONNECT
        used by the server to indicate a person disconnecting. appended should be the name of the disconnected client
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CHAT

        static final java.lang.String CHAT
        This is used by the client to send a chat message appended should be the message to be sent.

        the server retransmits this message to everybody with the chat extension enabled

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
